game.title: The Lost Artifact Quest
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from Elrond's advice
game.description: The forest's ancient ruins, guided by Old Sage Elrond, hold a powerful artifact. The adventurers seek it.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins, Unique artifact, Adventure points

task.objective: Embark on the journey to the ruins
task.description: Traverse deep into the forest to reach the ancient ruins.
Search for the artifact in the central chamber. It holds great significance.
task.location: The Central Chamber of The Ancient Ruins

task.objective: Return to Elrond with the artifact
task.description: Deliver the artifact back to Old Sage Elrond in the town.
